title: Ending Radical Indoctrination in K-12 Schooling
summary: This executive order aims to eliminate 'radical indoctrination' in K-12 public schools, which could include restricting certain teaching materials and curricula. While the order is focused on K-12 education, it may have broader implications for higher education institutions like Yale University.
full_text: The order could potentially impact university funding and research if it leads to reduced federal grants or contracts for programs that are deemed to be engaging in 'radical indoctrination'. This could create financial uncertainty and challenges for universities like Yale.

university_impact_areas.name: Student Aid & Higher Education Finance
university_impact_areas.description: Changes to student financial aid, federal student loans, and university funding mechanisms
